events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the wrong product being delivered to the customer.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer going forward.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I’m here to help get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can verify and process your refund?
I have attached the photos of the item along with a screenshot of my order confirmation for you to review.
Thank you for the info. I’ve initiated the refund process and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for resolving this so quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund and your help sorting this out.
The refund case has been marked as resolved following the confirmation from the customer that the issue has been addressed.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is now satisfactory on your end.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this refund case now. Thank you for your patience.
